name: Tribute: Return to the City of Secrets
name_original: Tribute: Return to the City of Secrets
description:
A text adventure. Winner of "The Emily Short Anniversary Contest 2020". This game is a tribute to a much better game by Emily Short called "City of Secrets". More information on that game can be found HERE.

Can be played online by following the first "download"-link below. There are ADRIFT Interpreters for Windows(official ADRIFT interpreter),  Mac & Linux (Frankendrift) and Android(Fabularium). If you have Windows, you may download the standalone-version too (Windows-executable), then you won't need an interpreter.

It is recommended to play "City of Secrets" by Emily Short first, as it takes place before the tribute-game.
